remarks: Rearrange restricted quantifiers with two different restricting classes, analogous to ~ raaan .  It is necessary that either both restricting classes are empty or both are not empty.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
raaan2.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
raaan2.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
raaan2 $p |- ( ( A = (/) <-> B = (/) ) -> ( A. x e. A A. y e. B ( ph /\ ps ) <-> ( A. x e. A ph /\ A. y e. B ps ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
